project.name: AppOptics Java Agent
project.description: The AppOptics Java instrumentation agent. Contains the required jar and configuration file for Windows and Linux. AppOptics provides application performance monitoring for Java web apps through this agent. The files contained here allow for event tracking within your application to identify latency timings between your application layers. More options can be found here: http://docs.appoptics.com/kb/apm_tracing/java/install/. For other information on our Java agent please visit http://docs.appoptics.com/kb/apm_tracing/java/ .
